  • Method Details

    • fillWeightMap

      private void fillWeightMap()
      Fill up the weightMap with right amounts. WightMap is Hashmap with String as key and Integer as value

    • heatingThread

      private void heatingThread()
      Thread to heat water (if the process is successful, water is replaced by hotWater Image)

    • fillInventory

      private void fillInventory()
      fill the inventoryTable GridPane with the items the player has currently collected

    • addInventoryListener

      private void addInventoryListener()

    • hasEnum

      private boolean hasEnum​(java.lang.String str)

    • setImageIntoImageView

      private void setImageIntoImageView​(java.lang.String url, javafx.scene.image.ImageView view)
      Create from given URL an image and set it to an ImageView
      Parameters:
      url - is the url to the png
      view - is the ImageView the image in which the image is set

    • addClickListener

      private void addClickListener​(java.lang.String key, javafx.scene.image.ImageView view)
      Set clicklistener on the inventory items. The respective item is placed on the scale. In case of click on WATER the heatingThread is started (removing WATER from inventory in LaboratoryController) and set heatingCount to 1 (water can only be heated once). Set the selectedElement to the value of the currently clicked element and call clickListenerReset()
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the clicked item
      view - the ImageView that is clicked

    • clickListenerReset

      private void clickListenerReset​(int index)
      Method for avoiding duplicate code in clickListener switch method that resets the scale and counter.
      Parameters:
      index - of gifURL Array.

    • putElemOnScale

      private void putElemOnScale​(javafx.scene.image.Image gif)
      Set a gif to the bowlBox ImageView. (A empty ImageView with a fix position)
      Parameters:
      gif - the image to be assigned to the ImageView

    • checkTheWeight

      private void checkTheWeight​(java.lang.String key)
      Checks the weight from a given key with weightMap. Changes the gif dynamically depending on the choosen amount. If player set right amount the current item is changed into a new item (no object from InventoryItems enum!)
      Parameters:
      key - the item/element, which the weight should be checked

    • replaceInventoryItem

      private void replaceInventoryItem​(java.lang.String key)
      Replace an inventoryTable item with the following item.
      Parameters:
      key - the item/element to replace with new item.

    • removeInviItem

      private void removeInviItem​(java.lang.String[] keys)
      Remove an inventoryTable item with given key
      Parameters:
      keys - the item/element to remove from inventoryTable

    • confirm

      public void confirm()
      This method ist the OnAction method from confirm button

      public void randomize()

      private void setCounterZero()
      Set the increase and decrease counter zero

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the gram label to zero

    • increaseWeight

      private void increaseWeight()
      Increase the amount on scale and replace the current gif.

    • decreaseWeight

      private void decreaseWeight()
      Decrease the amount on scale and replace the current gif.

    • replaceRightMeasure

      private void replaceRightMeasure​(byte count)
      Replace dinamically the current gif by given count
      Parameters:
      count - is the current amount of gram

    • replaceTooMuchMeasure

      private void replaceTooMuchMeasure()
      Replace dynamically the current gif with gif ...tooMuch.gif

    • setClickableScale

      private void setClickableScale()
      Set clicklistener on plus and minus button

      Add a given ImageView to container
      Parameters:
      gif - ist the ImageView
      x - ,y is the position of the gif

    • removeImageView

      private void removeImageView​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView content)
      Remove an ImageView from container
      Parameters:
      content - is the ImageView that should removed

    • setDistillerListener

      private void setDistillerListener()
      Set the clicklistener on distillerButton (add fire gif, or remove fire gif)

    • addClicklistenerForVaccine

      private void addClicklistenerForVaccine​(java.lang.String key, javafx.scene.image.ImageView view)
      Set clicklistener on new (TableController intern) inventory items with given key and ImageView. Set the booleans true if the item in the view is clicked and call fillUpMixer() method.
      Parameters:
      key - is key of item that is clicked
      view - is the ImageView of inventoryTable

    • setClicked

      private void setClicked​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView view)
      Set the background color and opacity of given ImageView
      Parameters:
      view - is the ImageView of inventoryTable

    • fillUpMixer

      private void fillUpMixer()
      check if all neccesary items are clicked and change the image of mixerBox to mixerFull. Call turnOnMixer.

    • mixingThread

      private void mixingThread()
      Thread sleeps 3 seconds by calling

    • mixVaccine

      private void mixVaccine()
      Set the mixerGif and call mixingThread. Deletes the items that are necessary for mixing and call TurnOffMixer

    • turnOnMixer

      private void turnOnMixer()
      This clicklistener set on mixerButton method mixVaccine()

    • turnOffMixer

      private void turnOffMixer()
      This clicklistener set on mixerButton null

    • stopMixing

      private void stopMixing()
      This method remove the mixerGif and set to mixerBox the mixerEmpty image. Call endMiniGame.

    • endMiniGame

      private void endMiniGame()
      This method remove the (may) leftover elements and add the vaccine item to inventory in LaboratoryController Call thread endCardThread

    • loadAnimationPopup

      private void loadAnimationPopup()

    • toString

      private java.lang.String toString​(int i)
      This Method return a given int to as string
      Parameters:
      i - Is the int that should be converted.
